00026 #ifndef _MSG_QUEUE_H
00027 #define _MSG_QUEUE_H
00028 
00029 #ifdef  _MSG_QUEUE_C
00030 #define MSG_EXT
00031 #else
00032 
00033 #define MSG_EXT    extern
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /*************************************************************************
00037 * INCLUDES
00038 *************************************************************************/
00039 #include "fb_hardware.h"
00040 
00041 
00042 /**************************************************************************
00043 * DEFINITIONS
00044 **************************************************************************/
00046 #define MSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH 25
00047 
00048 /* Flags for msg */
00049 #define MSG_AUTOFREE     (1<<0)  
00050 #define MSG_HI_PRIO      (1<<1)  
00053 #define COUNT_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(x) (sizeof(x)/sizeof(x[0]))
00054 
00056 enum emsg_state {
00057      MSG_FREE = 0x00,   
00058      MSG_ALLOC,         
00059      MSG_SENDING,       
00060      MSG_WAIT_ACK,      
00061      MSG_COMPLETE,      
00062 };
00063 
00065 struct msg {
00066     enum emsg_state state;               
00067     uint8_t flags;                     
00068     uint8_t *handler;                  
00069     uint8_t len;                       
00070     uint8_t data[MSG_MAX_DATA_LENGTH];   
00071     uint8_t repeat;                      
00072     struct msg *next;                    
00073 };
00074

00076 * DECLARATIONS
00077 **************************************************************************/
00078 
00079 
00080 /*************************************************************************
00081 * FUNCTION PROTOTYPES
00082 **************************************************************************/
00083 MSG_EXT void msg_queue_init(void);
00084 MSG_EXT struct msg* AllocMsgI(void);
00085 MSG_EXT void dequeuemsg(struct msg* *ptr);
00086 MSG_EXT void queuemsg(struct msg* *ptr, struct msg *pmsg, void (*trigger)(void));
00087 
00088 
00089 /**************************************************************************
00090 * IMPLEMENTATION
00091 **************************************************************************/
00092 
00099 static inline void FreeMsg(struct msg* pmsg)
00100 {
00101     pmsg->state = MSG_FREE;
00102 }
00103 
00110 static inline struct msg* AllocMsg(void)
00111 {
00112     struct msg* ret;
00113 
00114     DISABLE_IRQS;
00115 
00116     ret = AllocMsgI();
00117 
00118     ENABLE_IRQS;
00119 
00120     return ret;
00121 }
